1370: Machtilden was born in Papenhofstede in 1370.
Got married to Hildebolding at age 20 in 1370.
Gave birth to Richolfus in 1370 at age 20.
1371: Gave birth to Truden in 1371 at age 21.
1372: Gave birth to Ghodekin in 1372 at age 22.
1374: Gave birth to Ringot in 1374 at age 24.
1375: Gave birth to Ricward in 1375 at age 25.
1378: Gave birth to Flore in 1378 at age 28.
1380: Gave birth to Ebram in 1380 at age 30.
1381: Lost son Ebram when Ebram was 2 years old.
